survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Electric Scooter Sharing Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of electric scooter sharing services to understand satisfaction levels, usage patterns, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How often do you use electric scooter sharing services?

questions.question_text: What factors influence your choice of electric scooter sharing service? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an optional open-ended response for 'Other'

script.question_text: What factors influence your choice of electric scooter sharing service? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the pricing of the electric scooter sharing service?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the pricing of the electric scooter sharing service?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the electric scooter sharing service?
questions.client_notes: Allow open-ended responses to capture detailed feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for substantial input.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the electric scooter sharing service?

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any safety issues while using the electric scooter sharing service?
questions.client_notes: Use a simple yes/no question. If 'Yes' is selected, route to Q5a for details.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with conditional routing to Q5a if 'Yes' is selected.

script.question_text: Have you experienced any safety issues while using the electric scooter sharing service?

questions.question_text: Please describe the safety issue you encountered.
questions.client_notes: Provide a text box for detailed descriptions of safety issues. Ensure anonymity if sensitive information is shared.

script.question_text: Please describe the safety issue you encountered.
